languages.text: "Будем надеяться, Лорд-капитан. Ладно я, рабочие привыкли видеть меня в отсеке. А вот внезапное появление Мастера дисциплины может вызвать вопросы".
"I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."
languages.original_text: "Будем надеяться, Лорд-капитан. Ладно я, рабочие привыкли видеть меня в отсеке. А вот внезапное появление Мастера дисциплины может вызвать вопросы".

traits.locale_text: "I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise quite a few eyebrows."
"I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise quite a few eyebrows."
"I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise quite a few eyebrows."
"I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise quite a few eyebrows."
"I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."
"I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."

languages.text: "Das hoffe ich, Lord Captain. Die Arbeiter sind daran gewöhnt, mich überall zu sehen, aber die unerwartete Ankunft des Waffenmeisters wird für Überraschung sorgen."
languages.original_text: "I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."

traits.locale_text: "Das hoffe ich, Lord Captain. Die Arbeiter sind daran gewöhnt, mich überall zu sehen, aber die unerwartete Ankunft des Waffenmeisters wird für Überraschung sorgen."

languages.text: «Eso espero, Lord Capitán. Los obreros ya están acostumbrados a verme por todas partes, pero la inesperada aparición de la maestra de armas va a levantar sospechas».
languages.original_text: "I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."

traits.locale_text: «Eso espero, Lord Capitán. Los obreros ya están acostumbrados a verme por todas partes, pero la inesperada aparición de la maestra de armas va a levantar sospechas».

languages.text: 「そうだといいですね、ロード・キャプテン。労働者達は、あちこちにいる私を見慣れてはいますが、予期せぬマスター・アット・アームの来訪には眉をひそめそうなもんですよ」
languages.original_text: "I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだといいですね、ロード・キャプテン。労働者達は、あちこちにいる私を見慣れてはいますが、予期せぬマスター・アット・アームの来訪には眉をひそめそうなもんですよ」

languages.text: “希望如此吧，舰长大人。我到处走动是件稀松平常的事情，工人们也都习惯了，但如果戒律大师突然出现，恐怕会让一部分人相当惊奇。”
languages.original_text: "I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."

traits.locale_text: “希望如此吧，舰长大人。我到处走动是件稀松平常的事情，工人们也都习惯了，但如果戒律大师突然出现，恐怕会让一部分人相当惊奇。”

languages.text: « Je l'espèce sincèrement, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les travailleurs ont l'habitude de me voir un peu partout, mais l'arrivée surprise du capitaine d'armes risque de provoquer une certaine suspicion. »
languages.original_text: "I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."

traits.locale_text: « Je l'espèce sincèrement, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Les travailleurs ont l'habitude de me voir un peu partout, mais l'arrivée surprise du capitaine d'armes risque de provoquer une certaine suspicion. »

languages.text: "Umarım haklısınızdır Lord Kaptan. İşçiler, beni her yerde görmeye alışkın. Ancak Silahtar'ın aniden ortaya çıkması, endişeleri de yanında getirecektir."
languages.original_text: "I sure hope so, Lord Captain. The workers are used to seeing me all over the place, but the unexpected arrival of the Master-at-Arms is going to raise a few eyebrows."
